timeline.message:
[index] fix _doc sorting issues

Using _doc is only allowed when using ES scroll paging API.
For searchAfter based paging and standard searches we will fall back to
the current ID field configured in the mapping or if none found to the
_id which is deprecated in ES 7.x and will be removed from Snow Owl as
soon as Elasticsearch removes it (probably in 8.0).
[core] where possible use the ID annotation instead of relying to _id

[index] add ID annotation to all documents that can support it

Report any other mapping that does not define its own ID field.

timeline.bodyText: Please add the fall-through marker back; it is hard to spot the absence of a break statement, sometimes even with the comment present 😄👓
